evidence: This torque acts in the direction perpendicular to both vectors, and it causes the magnetization to tip away from the z-axis.
triples.o: magnetization to tip away from the z-axis

triples.evidence: In the steady state, this vector points along the z-axis, aligned with the static magnetic field B-zero.
triples.o: collective magnetic moment of all protons
